message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method based on reinforcement learning for reducing communication overhead in IoT solutions. This involves learning which sensors should send their data to the central node and which to drop data, which is a problem related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The proposed approach has been evaluated on a multi-view multi-camera dataset, which suggests that the paper may also belong to computer vision (cs.CV) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with the communication overhead reduction, which is a problem related to distributed computing (cs.DC).
